name: Admiral Motti (V)
Lore: 'Senior Navy Commander of Death Star. Believes in technology. Ridiculed the Force. Ambitious leader. Promoted due to support of New Order, not military skills. Hates Vader.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  Chiraneau may not modify your Force drains.  Kuat Drive Yards is [Immune to Alter].  Unless your Senate on table, unique (•) Star Destroyers are power +2 and immunity to attrition +1.  Once per game, may deploy non-[Virtual Block 4] Kuat Drive Yards from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
